document.full_text: an arizona man was arrested on friday on charges he made chemical weapons and used them to release a cloud of poisonous chlorine gas outside the home of a tucson couple, authorities said.
document.title: arizona man arrested on chemical weapon charges
lines_and_colors: an arizona man was arrested on friday on charges he made chemical weapons and used them to release a cloud of poisonous chlorine gas outside the home of a tucson couple, authorities said.
